authorInfo.name: Agung Developer (Ultimate Merged Non-Root by Gemini)

fullGameBoost: refresh_rate=120; echo '█▓▒▒░░░ Starting Ultimate All-in-One Boost (NON-ROOT) ░░░▒▒▓█'; echo 'Target: 120 FPS | Game: {packageName}'; sleep 1; echo '--- 1. Eliminating UI Latency ---'; settings put global window_animation_scale 0.0; settings put global transition_animation_scale 0.0; settings put global animator_duration_scale 0.0; settings put system touch.pressure.scale 0.001; settings put secure long_press_timeout 250; echo '[✔] Animations & Touch Latency Optimized.'; sleep 1; echo '--- 2. Maximizing System Resources ---'; am kill-all; cmd jobscheduler monitor-battery off; cmd jobscheduler cache-config-changes off; cmd device_config put activity_manager max_cached_processes 0; echo '[✔] Background processes terminated, scheduler set to performance.'; sleep 1; echo '--- 3. Activating Peak Performance Mode ---'; cmd power set-mode 0; dumpsys deviceidle disable; settings put global low_power 0; settings put global performance_mode 1; settings put global stay_on_while_plugged_in 3; echo '[✔] Doze mode disabled, max performance mode activated.'; sleep 1; echo '--- 4. Forcing Absolute 120Hz & Disabling Adaptive FPS ---'; settings put secure user_refresh_rate $refresh_rate; settings put system min_refresh_rate $refresh_rate; settings put system peak_refresh_rate $refresh_rate; settings put global min_fps $refresh_rate; settings put global max_fps $refresh_rate; settings put system power.dfps.level 0; settings put system disable_idle_fps true; settings put system display.disable_dynamic_fps 1; settings put system display.disable_mitigated_fps 1; settings put global dfps.enable false; settings put global smart_dfps.enable false; settings put global fps.switch.thermal false; echo '[✔] Refresh rate locked to 120Hz, adaptive systems disabled.'; sleep 1; echo '--- 5. Unleashing GPU, Game Driver & Rendering Pipeline ---'; setprop debug.sf.latch_unsignaled 1; setprop debug.sf.enable_hwc_vds 1; setprop debug.renderengine.backend skiagl; setprop debug.egl.swapinterval 0; setprop debug.egl.hw 1; setprop debug.hwui.renderer skiagl; setprop debug.hwui.disable_vsync true; settings put system game_driver_power_saving_mode 0; settings put system game_driver_vsync_enable 0; settings put system game_driver_gpu_mode 1; settings put system game_driver_fps_limit $refresh_rate; setprop debug.graphics.game_default_frame_rate $refresh_rate; setprop debug.performance.profile 1; setprop persist.sys.gpu_perf_mode 1; echo '[✔] GPU, Driver, and Rendering configured for raw performance.'; sleep 1; echo '--- 6. Optimizing Network for Low-Latency Gaming ---'; setprop net.ipv4.tcp_timestamps 0; setprop net.ipv4.tcp_sack 1; setprop net.ipv4.tcp_tw_reuse 1; setprop net.ipv4.tcp_fastopen 3; setprop net.tcp.buffersize.default 4096,1048576,2097152,4096,1048576,2097152; echo '[✔] Network stack optimized for minimum ping.'; sleep 1; echo '--- 7. Disabling Performance-Draining System Logs ---'; setprop persist.log.tag F; setprop log.tag.d F; setprop log.tag.V F; setprop ro.config.nocheckin 1; settings put global anr_debugging_setting 0; echo '[✔] Unnecessary logging disabled to reduce overhead.'; sleep 1; echo '--- 8. Finalizing for {packageName} & Flushing Memory ---'; dumpsys deviceidle whitelist +{packageName}; am force-stop {packageName}; sync; dumpsys meminfo --clear-all-caches; echo '[✔] Game optimized and system memory flushed.'; echo ''; echo '█▓▒▒░░░ ULTIMATE NON-ROOT BOOST COMPLETE! ENJOY THE GAME! ░░░▒▒▓█'
utilityRamClean: echo '█▓▒▒░░░ CLEANING RAM & SYSTEM CACHES (NON-ROOT) ░░░▒▒▓█'; am kill-all; sync; dumpsys meminfo --clear-all-caches; echo '[✔] RAM and system memory caches cleared successfully.'; echo '█▓▒▒░░░ RAM CLEAN COMPLETE ░░░▒▒▓█'
utilityStorageClean: echo '█▓▒▒░░░ DEEP CLEANING STORAGE CACHE (NON-ROOT) ░░░▒▒▓█'; rm -rf /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/*/cache/*; echo '[✔] Attempted to clear all accessible application caches.'; echo '█▓▒▒░░░ CACHE CLEAN COMPLETE ░░░▒▒▓█'
